name: paper-calculator
description: A fancy looking calculator that can only perform simple math calculation.

attributes.name: wideMode
attributes.description: If true, calculator changes to wide layout.

attributes.name: responsiveWidth
attributes.description: Min-width when calculator changes to wide layout.

attributes.name: expression
attributes.description: The expression entered to the calculator.

attributes.name: result
attributes.description: The result from evaluating the expression.
